1.title: Sleep
1.description: Rate the overall quality of your sleep, where "10" means "very high quality" and "1" means "very low quality."

2.title: Weight Management
2.description: How would you rate your consistency in sticking with your weight management program,  where  "10" means I am very consistent, while  "1" means I am very inconsistent.

3.title: Stress
3.description: How would you rate your consistency minimizing stress in your life,  where  "10" means I am very consistent, while  "1" means I am very inconsistent.

4.title: Mindset
4.description: How would you rate your consistency in maintaining a positive mindset pertaining to your health & wellness where  "10" means I am very consistent, while  "1" means I am very inconsistent.

5.title: Exercise
5.description: How would you rate the quality of exercise you are getting on a 10-point scale, where "10" means I consistently get at least 3 days a week of high intensity exertion interspersed with rest, totaling at least 12 minutes.  "1" means I consistently fall short of that goal.

6.title: Hydration
6.description: How would you rate your consistency in sticking with your hydration program,  where  "10" means I am very consistent, while  "1" means I am very inconsistent.

7.title: Nutrition
7.description: How would you rate your consistency in consuming all required vitamins and minerals,  where  "10" means I am very consistent, while  "1" means I am very inconsistent.

8.title: Digestion
8.description: How would you rate your consistency in sticking with your digestive health program,  where  "10" means I am very consistent, while  "1" means I am very inconsistent.
